General.Name: Ufuk Yatirim Yonetim Ve Gayrimenkul AS
General.Description: UFUK Yatirim Yonetim ve Gayrimenkul A.S. engages in financial leasing business. It leases machinery, equipment, land and sea transport vehicles, and other fixed assets. The company was formerly known as Fon Sinai Yatirimlar A.S. and changed its name to UFUK Yatirim Yonetim ve Gayrimenkul A.S. in May 2016. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. UFUK Yatirim Yonetim ve Gayrimenkul A.S. is a subsidiary of Yildiz Holding A.S.
